translation.text: Train services are running at a reduced frequency today due to significant train maintenance required following damage caused by the recent severe storms. Trains are running every 20 minutes. Customers can also utilise local bus routes 525 and 526. Please allow additional travel time, listen to announcements and check indicator boards and Transport Apps for updates.

Buses are replacing trains between Bathurst, Lithgow, and Springwood due to a landslide at Leura and infrastructure damage caused by recent bushfires. Due to the displacement of train services following the landslide at Leura - and to ensure a frequent service - some trains will operate with four carriages instead of eight. At this stage, the line between Springwood and Mt Victoria is expected to remain closed until at least next week. Due to the extent of the damage caused by the bushfires, buses will continue to replace trains between Mount Victoria and Lithgow for some time. We will continue to keep you informed as repair works progress; Please listen to announcements, check indicator boards, and monitor Transport apps for updates.

TOOL in Concert - Qudos Bank Arena, Sydney Olympic Park
19:30 to 23:00
- Trains run from Lidcombe to Olympic Park every 10 minutes until midnight.

For further information please visit transport.nsw.info/events

The lift between the concourse and platforms 22/23 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 1777.

Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrades the lifts from George Street to Concourse Level will be closed until July 2020.   During these works, Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.

Newtown, Croydon & Wondabyne Stations - External power supply issues may be affecting platform screens, Opal card readers and station lighting. For Opal information or fare adjustments, please visit transportnsw.info/opal.
Denistone Station - Indicator screens and announcements are currently unavailable - Please refer to Transport Apps or see Station Staff for information.
Station Update - Blacktown, Central, Parramatta and more

Due to a landslide at Leura and damage caused by recent bushfires, buses are replacing trains between Springwood, Lithgow and Bathurst. Many Blue Mountains Line train services have been operating as 4 carriages instead of 8. We kindly ask that customers travelling to stations between Penrith and the city board T1 Western Line services to avoid congestion on Blue Mountains Line trains

The public toilets at Beverly Hills station are currently unavailable while major repairs take place. Temporary toilets have been provided and are located outside the station on Tooronga Terrace. These facilities can be accessed during staffed hours. We apologise for any inconvenience.

The Southern Tunnel will be closed for Sydney Metro Works from 10pm to 5am each night from Monday 17 to Thursday 20 February. Please use the Suburban Tunnel for access to Platforms 4 to 23 or travel via the Northern Concourse.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Station Upgrade - Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from the concourse level to George Street will be closed from Saturday 8th February until July 2020. Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.
